messages.subject: Re: Descendant
messages.msgSnippet: I think we have questions (^_^) but if we know which member of the Shinsengumi it would be better so we know what to ask and ofcourse we understand if he or
messages.messageBody:
I think we have questions (^_^)
but if we know which member of the Shinsengumi it would be better so we
know what to ask

and ofcourse we understand if he or she cannot answer immediately

thank you so much for keeping us in your thoughts Nefrut we really
appreciate it !

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "nefret_nubti" <nefret_nubti@...> wrote:
>
> A friend of mine met a descendant of a shinsengumi member, leaving out
> which shinsengumi member it is... I was thinking some one on this site
> may have some questions to ask and such. If you do, let me know !
>

messages.subject: Descendant
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine met a descendant of a shinsengumi member, leaving out which shinsengumi member it is... I was thinking some one on this site may have some
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine met a descendant of a shinsengumi member, leaving out
which shinsengumi member it is... I was thinking some one on this site
may have some questions to ask and such. If you do, let me know !
